snippet: Siemens, the German industrial giant, said on Thursday that it would cut 4,500 jobs as a slump in oil prices has eroded its sales of equipment to the energy industry.
abstract: German industrial giant Siemens will cut 4,500 jobs amid falling sales of equipment to energy sector.
lead_paragraph: Siemens, the German industrial giant, said on Thursday that it would cut 4,500 jobs as a slump in oil prices has eroded its sales of equipment to the energy industry.

headline.main: Siemens to Cut 4,500 Jobs, Half of Them in Germany
headline.print_headline: Siemens to Cut 4,500 Jobs, Half of Them in Germany
